boardgame.name: 18AL
boardgame.description: 18AL is a shorter 18xx game set in Alabama and designed by Mark Derrick. It is currently available as a free print-and-play game from John David Galt._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;6 Companies_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; ABC - Atlanta, Birmingham and Coast Railroad_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; ATN - Alabama, Tennessee and Northern Railroad_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; L_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp;N - Louisville and Nashville Railroad_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; M_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp;O - Mobile and Ohio Railroad_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; TAG - Tennessee, Alabama and Georgia Railway_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; WRA - Western Railway of Alabama_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;5 Private Companies_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Tuscumbia Railway_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; South and North Alabama Railroad (coal field token)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Brown and Sons Lumber Company (lumber terminal tile)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Memphis and Charleston Railroad (train name chits)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; New Decatur Yards (half-price train purchase)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: This is a DIY kit directly from the designer, new in the package. Shares, tiles, etc. are laminated. Everything included. Buyer to pay actual shipping _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; handling costs from Ohio. Thanks!
Ready to play. Everything is included and ready to play out of the Box.
For mobileg.
For Auction winner bloddragon.
Reserved for BGG user: herendil66
This game was a preorder.

Mounted Tiles, mounted boards, mounted charters, mounted trains, privates and shares, station and share tokens on wood discs. Does not include money. This is the Koryo Set! Yes, Koryo has graciously allowed me to print up his stuff. 1 map board 1 stock market board 6 charters (chipboard) 56 shares 35 trains, private company certificates 34 station and tracking tokens on wood discs 106 chipboard hexes Rules Medium Box More Info and Options at: http://www.boardgamegeek.com/geeklist/47270/item/768337, 768335, 768334#item768337, 768335, 768334 Size (for shipping purposes): Large
for ladue, winner of game auction

Unplayed. Was never in shrink. Koryo version. Very nicely done by Print and Play Productions, but I never have played it. Does not include game money. See: http://boardgamegeek.com/geeklist/47270/print-play-productions-games I ship fast and can combine shipping. Paypal users will need to add Paypal fees

Koryo Redesign made for me by Andrew Tullsen/Print _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Play Productions. Very nice, played only once or twice. (FYI - like many 18XX games, this does not come with paper money) Shipping will be $10 via USPS Priority. (If I can do it cheaper in a Priority Regional box, I will charge less)

Version Info: Boards, charters, shares, trains and hexes are all mounted and cut out, ready to play. Station discs are applied to colored wood discs. 1 map board 1 stock market board 6 charters 56 shares 35 trains, private company certificates 34 station and tracking tokens on wood discs 106 chipboard hexes Rules Box

Koryo redesign by Print _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Play Games. Played once. Came with a couple minor marks on the box. Buyer pays exact shipping cost. I will combine shipping with other items. Free local pickup also available. International buyers welcome. PayPal is preferred. Let me know if you need another payment method.

Complete and in excellent condition. Most components (not map) are mounted and covered with adhesive laminate. Game comes with a 1_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; white box with game cover adhered to box top. Actual shipping costs added from 44074. Thus if you reside in the east, I will ship it cheaper than by priority flat rate by using my own box or a regional box B.

18AL is a shorter 18xx game set in Alabama and designed by Mark Derrick. Contents List: 1 map board 1 stock market board 6 charters 56 shares 35 trains, private company certificates 34 station and tracking tokens on wood discs 106 chipboard hexes Rules Box Version Info: Boards, charters, shares, trains and hexes are all mounted and cut out, ready to play. Station discs are applied to colored wood discs.

Used copy of the Koryo redesign (from Print _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Play Admagic). The components are undamaged but it is a PNP game (though PNP by a professional). $12 flat rate shipping. Can be combined with other orders for the same shipping cost.
This is only a kit. Money not supplied. Please see pictures
